chapter.text: M. (Ha. Mim)
By the clear (and clarifying) book
Indeed We revealed it in a blessed night, indeed We are warners
Every wise command is made distinct (and well defined) in it
a command from Us. Indeed We are senders
A mercy from your Master. Indeed He hears all, knows all
Master of the skies and the earth and whatever is between them, if you are certain
There is no god except Him, He gives life and causes death, your Master and Master of your forefathers
No, but they play around in doubt
So expect a day that the sky brings a visible smoke
covering people. This is a painful punishment
Our Master, remove the punishment from us, indeed we are believers
How is the reminder (of any use) for them, while a clarifying messenger has come to them
and they turned away from him and they said he is a mad man taught (by others)
We remove the punishment a little, (then) indeed you return (to disbelief)
On a day that We assault with the great assault, indeed We take revenge
And We have certainly tested people of Pharaoh before them, and a noble messenger came to them
(saying) that: deliver the servants of God to me, I am an honest messenger for you
and do not (try to) rise over God, indeed I brought you a clear reason
And indeed I look for protection with my Master and your Master, that you don't stone me
And if you do not believe me then stay away from me
Then he (Moses) called on his Master: indeed these are guilty people
(God told Moses:) So travel with My servants by night, indeed you will be followed
and leave the sea calmly, indeed they will be a drowned army
How many gardens and springs did they leave behind
and plantations and superb residence
and riches that they were happy in it
It was like that, and We made other people inherit it
And the skies and the earth did not cry over them, and they were not given any delay
And We have certainly saved the children of Israel from the humiliating punishment
of Pharaoh. He was indeed foremost among the excessive ones
And We have certainly chosen them knowingly above all other people
And We gave them the signs, that in which there was a clear test
Indeed these (people) say
there is only our first death, and we will not be raised (again)
if you are truthful then bring (back) our fathers
Are they better or people of Tubba and those before them? We destroyed them, indeed they were guilty
And We did not create the skies and the earth and whatever is between them playing around
We did not create them except with the truth (and purpose), but most of them do not know
Indeed the day of separation/decision is appointment for all of them
A day when a friend is not of any use to any friend at all, and they are not be helped
except whoever God has mercy (on him). He is indeed the powerful, the merciful
Indeed the Zaqqum tree
is food of the sinful
It boils in the stomachs like melted metal (or burning oil)
like boiling of the boiling water
Take him and drag him into the middle of the hellfire
Then pour from punishment of the boiling water over his head
Taste, indeed you (thought you) are the powerful and the noble
Indeed this is what you used to doubt about it
Those who control themselves will be in a safe position
in gardens and springs
They wear (clothes) from fine and heavy silk, facing each other
It is like that. And We marry them to appealing girls with beautiful eyes
They call for all kind of fruit in there safely
They do not taste death in it except the first death, and He protected them from punishment of the hellfire
A bounty (and a grace) from your Master. That is the great victory
Indeed We made it (Quran) easy in your language so that they may take notice
So watch, indeed they are watching (too)
